name: Fish Kermesse
description:
Fishing Time!

You went with your moms to the Fish Kermesse.
Play some fishing, eat delicious food, win prizes, and above all, have fun!
Maybe you'll even see your crush around =D

How to Play:

  • Move & Navigate menus with arrow keys or WASD
  • Press (e) to interact, (x) to cancel
  • Press space or left-click on screen to fish!
  • Press escape to open in-game menu
  • Press (f) to toggle fullscreen mode

A game by Rafael Minari & Richard "roh42" Silva
Made between October 23-30, 2016 for the Fishing Jam 2!
